title: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential/Commercial Zone in respect of closed industries shall be permitted subject to NOC from Labour Commissioner, GoM
clause_text: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential/Commercial Zone in respect of closed industries shall be permitted subject to NOC from Labour Commissioner, GoM. Provided that where conversion has been permitted on the basis of this certificate, Occupation Certificate will not be given unless a no dues certificate is granted by the Labour Commissioner.
section: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential or Commercial Zone for the Uses permissible in Residential or Commercial Zone
